content.question: Write an essay that: Has a relevant thesis. Addresses all parts of the question. Supports thesis with specific evidence. Is well organized. Analyze the ways in which the policies of Joseph Stalin transformed the policies of Vladimir Lenin.

frqParts.text: Write an essay that: Has a relevant thesis. Addresses all parts of the question. Supports thesis with specific evidence. Is well organized. Analyze the ways in which the policies of Joseph Stalin transformed the policies of Vladimir Lenin.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
